item.title: Apple Health+ Reportedly Launching Next Year With Two New Features
item.description: Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman today said he expects a paid Apple Health+ service to debut next year. In his Power On newsletter, Gurman said Apple Health+ will consist of an AI-based health coach that offer
